title: Wally Pipp’s Career-Ending ‘Headache’
subtitle: Baseball folklore holds that Lou Gehrig's famous consecutive game streak began when the Yankees' first baseman Wally Pipp sat out a game with a headache.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Lou Gehrig's consecutive game streak began when Yankee first baseman Wally Pipp sat out a game with a headache.
